com.software.reuze

Interface mpt_i_InferenceForwardBackward

  • All Superinterfaces:
    mpt_i_InferenceForwardStep, mpt_InferenceBackwardStep
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    mp_HMMInferenceForwardBackward, mp_HMMInferenceForwardBackwardConstantSpace, mpt_InferenceForwardBackward

    public interface mpt_i_InferenceForwardBackward
extends mpt_i_InferenceForwardStep, mpt_InferenceBackwardStep
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 576.

    Generic interface for calling different implementations of the forward-backward algorithm for smoothing: computing posterior probabilities of a sequence of states given a sequence of observations.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator> forwardBackward(List<List<mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment>> ev, mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator prior)
      The forward-backward algorithm for smoothing: computing posterior probabilities of a sequence of states given a sequence of observations.

    • Method Detail

      • forwardBackward

        List<mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator> forwardBackward(List<List<mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment>> ev,
                                                         mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator prior)
        The forward-backward algorithm for smoothing: computing posterior probabilities of a sequence of states given a sequence of observations.
        Parameters:
        ev - a vector of evidence values for steps 1,...,t
        prior - the prior distribution on the initial state, P(X0)
        Returns:
        a vector of smoothed estimates for steps 1,...,t
